amendment.description: To provide that the Secretary of Homeland Security has published in the Federal Register the Department?s privacy notice for CAPPS II or no later than 60 days after enactment of this Act, whichever is later.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1355 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1355 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9783-9785; text: CR S9784) To provide that the Secretary of Homeland Security has published in the Federal Register the Department?s privacy notice for CAPPS II or no later than 60 days after enactment of this Act, whichever is later.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1355 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1355 proposed by Senator Byrd.
